body_html: As mentioned in #12102, the issue is that arg checking happens in Distribution.__init__(), but MultivariateNormal.__init__() performs some linear algebra before calling super(...).__init__(). I think the solution is to move any linear algebra operations below the super(...).__init__() call in MultivariateNormal.__init__().

body: As mentioned in #12102, the issue is that arg checking [happens](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/distribution.py#L30) in `Distribution.__init__()`, but `MultivariateNormal.__init__()` performs some linear algebra before calling `super(...).__init__()`. I think the solution is to move any linear algebra operations below the `super(...).__init__()` call in `MultivariateNormal.__init__()`.
